Let $ C_1$ and $ C_2$ be circles defined by\\
\[ (x - 10)^2 + y^2 = 36\]and\\
\[ (x + 15)^2 + y^2 = 81,\]respectively. What is the length of the shortest line segment $ \overline{PQ}$ that is tangent to $ C_1$ at $ P$ and to $ C_2$ at $ Q$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 15 \qquad \textbf{(B)}\ 18 \qquad \textbf{(C)}\ 20 \qquad \textbf{(D)}\ 21 \qquad \textbf{(E)}\ 24$
